question: Calculate the average production rate per year from 1971 to 1980. Among them, name the cars with a weight of fewer than 1800 lbs.
llm_answer: SELECT T2.car_name, COUNT(T1.ID) / COUNT(DISTINCT T1.model_year) AS avg_production_per_year FROM production AS T1 INNER JOIN data AS T2 ON T1.ID = T2.ID WHERE T1.model_year BETWEEN 1971 AND 1980 AND T2.weight < 1800 GROUP BY T1.ID COLLATE NOCASE
correct_answer: SELECT CAST(COUNT(T1.ID) AS REAL) / 9 FROM production AS T1 INNER JOIN data AS T2 ON T2.ID = T1.ID WHERE T1.model_year BETWEEN 1971 AND 1980 UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT T2.car_name FROM production AS T1 INNER JOIN data AS T2 ON T2.ID = T1.ID WHERE T1.model_year BETWEEN 1971 AND 1980 AND T2.weight < 1800

question: Provide the ID of cars from Japan worth greater than 35000 and have an acceleration of 14.
llm_answer: SELECT T1.ID FROM price AS T1 INNER JOIN production AS T2 ON T1.ID = T2.ID INNER JOIN country AS T3 ON T2.country = T3.origin INNER JOIN data AS T4 ON T4.ID = T1.ID WHERE T3.country = 'Japan' AND T1.price > 35000 AND T4.acceleration = 14 COLLATE NOCASE
correct_answer: SELECT T4.ID FROM price AS T1 INNER JOIN production AS T2 ON T1.ID = T2.ID INNER JOIN country AS T3 ON T3.origin = T2.country INNER JOIN data AS T4 ON T4.ID = T1.ID WHERE T3.country = 'Japan' AND T1.price > 3500 AND T4.acceleration = 14
